name: habittrove
tagline: A self-hosted app for building habits with streaks and consistency tracking
description: HabitTrove is a simple self-hosted habit-building app that lets users create tasks, track consistency, and view streaks with an attractive mobile-friendly web interface.

features.title: Habit Tracking
features.description: Records recurring habits and tracks completion status over time

features.title: Streak Monitoring
features.description: Tracks consecutive days of habit completion

features.title: Progress History
features.description: Displays historical habit data for review

features.title: Simple User Interface
features.description: Provides a minimal interface focused on habit entry and review

features.title: Web Application
features.description: Accesses habit data through a browser interface

features.title: Local Data Storage
features.description: Stores habit data locally under user control

features.title: Data Export
features.description: Exports habit records for external use

features.title: Self-Hosted Habit App
features.description: Run the application on your own infrastructure
